pButton.Name: A
pButton.popInfo: Notice the size, amount, and level of sophistication of the text on this page.

pButton.Name: B
pButton.popInfo: This AP-level book places subheadings alongside narrative content.

pButton.Name: C
pButton.popInfo: College-level textbooks used in AP classes don't always emphasize vocabulary words and may not feature a glossary.

pButton.Name: D
pButton.popInfo: This book provides more detailed information about Rousseau's works, including <font face="c-italic">The Social Contract</font>. AP and college students need this additional information to score high on the AP exam or to succeed in college classes.
